spell.n: A brutal attack that deals %data%-%data% plus weapon damage.
Causes the target to bleed for %data%-%data% physical damage for %data% turns. Deals 30% weapon damage.
Makes your enemy run in fear for %data% turns.
Inflicts %data%-%data% fire damage and has a 50% chance of burning the target afterwards.
Inflicts %data%-%data% fire damage and has a 50% chance of burning the target afterwards.
Your target will forget all of your crimes.
Freezes the target in place for %data% turns.
Summon a healing tree to aid you and your pet.
Curses the target for %data%-%data% shadow damage each turn for %data% turns.
If your %r%target's health is below 25%%r% you can perform a powerful finishing blow. Deals %data%-%data% plus weapon damage.
%r%Requires a melee weapon%r% and a %r%Rose Hip%r%.
After %r%the target parried or dodged%r% you have the opportunity to strike back immediately. Deals %data%-%data% damage plus weapon damage.
Perform a perfect shot that results in a critical hit. A percet shot never misses.
Transforms your enemy into a pig. While the enemy is transformed it will wander around for %data% turns. Any damage will break the transformation.
Your next spell will cost no mana. This spell has a random cooldown.
Inflicts %data%-%data% fire damage and has a 75% chance of seriously burning the target afterwards. Needs to be charged up. (this spell requires 2 turns)
Unleash fiery rain that deals %data%-%data% fire damage to your enemies. Has a 50% chance of seriously burning the target afterwards.
Slash up to three targets in front of you. Deals %data%-%data% plus weapon damage.
A strong attack that deals %data%-%data% plus weapon damage.
Usage: When selected you are able to specify where to teleport with a right click.
Inflicts %data%-%data% shadow damage and has a 30% chance of cursing the target afterwards.
It should be able to extinguish torches on walls and other small flames.
Frightens the target, decreasing its defences.
Increases the bears defences for %data% turns.
The deer heals you for %data%-%data% health.
The pet tries to take the target's attention.
Hurls a ball of spit towards the target.
Covers the target in a sticky web for %data% turns.
Frightens the target, reducing its damage for %data% turns.
Increases the wolf's damage for %data% turns.
Dodge chance is increased greatly for %data% turns.
Summons large crystals around the caster, creating a protective barrier for 6 turns. Crystals will only appear if nothing is in the way.
While %r%wounded%r%, use your anger to attack the target for %data%-%data% plus weapon damage.
Pulls the target towards you. At least one free tile is needed around you.
Shoots through your enemies. Targets need to be in a line. A maximum of 3 enemies are affected. Deals %data%-%data% plus weapon damage.
Decrease the armour of your target by %data%. Stackable up to %data% times.
Throw a stone towards the target attracting its attention. Only idle targets can be distracted!
Enemies affected by weakened healing receive a 50% penalty on every healing effect for %data% turns.
Cannot use spells while under this effect. Lasts %data% turns.
Teleport the target to a random place nearby.
Enemies affected by weakened healing receive a 50% penalty on every healing effect for %data% turns.
Lowers the accumulated threat value towards the caster.
Causes the target to bleed for %data%-%data% physical damage for %data% turns and deals 100% weapon damage.
Unleash fiery rain that deals %data%-%data% fire damage to your enemies. Has a 100% chance of seriously burning the target afterwards.
Causes the target to bleed for %data%-%data% physical damage for %data% turns and deals 100% weapon damage. The damage caused by the bleeding will heal you.
Sing the song of the druid's to recover 25% of your total health over 5 turns.
Inflicts %data%-%data% fire damage and has a 50% chance of burning the target afterwards.
Inflicts %data%-%data% frost damage and has a 30% chance of freezing the target.
Causes the target to bleed for %data%-%data% physical damage for %data% turns and deals 110% weapon damage.
Causes the target to bleed for %data%-%data% physical damage for %data% turns. Deals 40% weapon damage.
Meditate for %data% turns. Every ability/spell has a 50% chance to reset it's cooldown.
Curses the target for %data%-%data% shadow damage each turn for %data% turns.
See your prey in the dark.
Puts the target into a deep sleep for %data% turns.
Puts the target into a deep sleep for %data% turns.
A devastating attack that deals %data%-%data% plus weapon damage and has a 35% chance to stun the target.
While the effect is active all healing done to you is increased by 25%.
Steal %data%-%data% life energy from the target.
Decrease the armour of your target by %data%. Stackable up to %data% times.
Raise your shield to absorb %data% magical damage.
Look into the distance to reveal unexplored areas.
Removes basic harmful effects from your pet.
When an enemy is one or two tiles away from you deal %data%-%data% plus weapon damage.
Place down an improvised trap on the ground. Requires %r%one wood%r%.
Enemies affected by weakened healing receive a 50% penalty on every healing effect for %data% turns.
Puts the target into a deep sleep for %data% turns.
Place down an improved improvised trap on the ground. Requires %r%one wood%r%.
Perform a precise attack between the armour plates of your enemy resulting in a strike that will ignore armour rating. Deals %data%-%data% plus weapon damage.
An attack that can only be perforemd while the target is stunned. Deals %data%-%data% plus weapon damage.

Leaves a small shard of the blade in the body of the victim. The shard will cause %data%-%data% shadow damage after %data% turns. Using this ability will always decrease the durability of the used dagger.
